description: Manage Azure Resource Manager template deployment at resource group.

commands.name: az deployment group cancel
commands.summary: Cancel a deployment at resource group.
examples: az deployment group cancel -g testrg -n deployment01

commands.name: az deployment group create
commands.summary: Start a deployment at resource group.
commands.syntax:
az deployment group create --resource-group
                           [--aux-subs]
                           [--aux-tenants]
                           [--confirm-with-what-if]
                           [--handle-extended-json-format]
                           [--mode {Complete, Incremental}]
                           [--name]
                           [--no-prompt {false, true}]
                           [--no-wait]
                           [--parameters]
                           [--proceed-if-no-change]
                           [--query-string]
                           [--rollback-on-error]
                           [--template-file]
                           [--template-spec]
                           [--template-uri]
                           [--what-if]
                           [--what-if-exclude-change-types {Create, Delete, Deploy, Ignore, Modify, NoChange, Unsupported}]
                           [--what-if-result-format {FullResourcePayloads, ResourceIdOnly}]
examples:
az deployment group create --resource-group testrg --name rollout01 \
    --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json

az deployment group create --resource-group testrg --name rollout01 \
    --template-file azuredeploy.json  \
    --parameters '{ \"policyName\": { \"value\": \"policy2\" } }'
az deployment group create --resource-group testgroup --template-file demotemplate.json --parameters exampleString='inline string' exampleArray='("value1", "value2")'

az deployment group create --resource-group testrg --name rollout01 \
    --template-file azuredeploy.json  --parameters @params.json \
    --parameters https://mysite/params.json --parameters MyValue=This MyArray=@array.json
az deployment group create --resource-group testrg --parameters parameters.bicepparam

az deployment group create --resource-group testrg --name rollout01 \
    --template-file azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json --aux-tenants auxiliary_tenant01 auxiliary_tenant02

commands.name: az deployment group delete
commands.summary: Delete a deployment at resource group.
examples: az deployment group delete -g testrg -n deployment01

commands.name: az deployment group export
commands.summary: Export the template used for a deployment.
examples: az deployment group export --resource-group testrg --name MyDeployment

commands.name: az deployment group show
commands.summary: Show a deployment at resource group.
examples: az deployment group show -g testrg -n deployment01

commands.name: az deployment group validate
commands.summary: Validate whether a template is valid at resource group.
commands.syntax:
az deployment group validate --resource-group
                             [--handle-extended-json-format]
                             [--mode {Complete, Incremental}]
                             [--name]
                             [--no-prompt {false, true}]
                             [--parameters]
                             [--query-string]
                             [--rollback-on-error]
                             [--template-file]
                             [--template-spec]
                             [--template-uri]
examples: az deployment group validate --parameters MyValue=This MyArray=@array.json --resource-group testrg --template-file azuredeploy.json

commands.name: az deployment group wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a deployment condition is met.
examples: az deployment group wait --created --name MyDeployment --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az deployment group what-if
commands.summary: Execute a deployment What-If operation at resource group scope.
commands.syntax:
az deployment group what-if --resource-group
                            [--aux-tenants]
                            [--exclude-change-types {Create, Delete, Deploy, Ignore, Modify, NoChange, Unsupported}]
                            [--mode {Complete, Incremental}]
                            [--name]
                            [--no-pretty-print]
                            [--no-prompt {false, true}]
                            [--parameters]
                            [--query-string]
                            [--result-format {FullResourcePayloads, ResourceIdOnly}]
                            [--template-file]
                            [--template-spec]
                            [--template-uri]
examples: az deployment group what-if --resource-group testrg --name rollout01 --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json
az deployment group what-if --resource-group testrg --name rollout01 --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json --result-format ResourceIdOnly
az deployment group what-if --resource-group testrg --name rollout01 --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json --no-pretty-print
